name: Satin
description:
Story

The Satin base ... a very important one indeed ... very helpful in this war.

Until it wasn't...

A Scrammer drone raid managed to disconnect the base from the main ones.

Your job is to reconnect it. Good luck and godspeed.

Details

Game made for the Jam for All BASIC Dialects (#4).

Until I figure out how to make the game playable on the itch.io page, a pack with Nintaco will have to do.

A new NES game made with Family Basic in 2023!

It's nothing much, it would've been much more if Family Basic wasn't so limited.

The collisions are indeed wacky. No idea how to make them better ¯\_(ツ)_/¯.
